rtega_mnemonic:
晝晝RS
昼昼		daytime, daylight
  • when writing with a brush in a sunlit place near the window 書 casts a shadow on a sheet of paper 一
  • ⓢ when the sun 日 casts a small 尺 shadow on the ground 一
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 昼)
Antonyms: 夜
Pictophonetic: 聿 indicates the sound; 旦 (day) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
晝夜 [ zhòu yè ]: day and night; period of 24 hours; continuously, without stop
晝伏夜出 [ zhòu fú yè chū ]: nocturnal; to hide by day and come out at night
晝夜不息 [ zhòu yè bù xī ]: day and night without rest (idiom)
晝長夜短 [ zhòu cháng yè duǎn ]: (In summer) the days are long and the nights short. (idiom)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 聿 [ yù ] writing brush, pencil; thereupon
    • 旦 [ dàn ] dawn; morning; day
heisig_chinese_memo: At daybreak the daylight comes through the window, you brush your eyes with your forearm, and wake up.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The ruler's favorite thing about daybreak is the soft daylight hitting his eyes.
humanum_full_description_en:
Jia Jin inscriptions from " Yu " to "日", used to express the meaning of day, but the original meaning of the configuration is unknown. "Said the text": "day, out of days, and night for the sector from drawing province, from the date of 𦘘, Zhou Wen day..." One that believes " Yu " to " day " of sound character, with " day " to form The symbol points understand the meaning of day (He Linyi, Huang Xiquan). Although the initials of " Yu " and " Xiao " are similar, the rhyme part of the two characters is far apart, which seems difficult to hold. One said that " day " is like standing wood as a table to measure the shadow of the sun with time, which was later extended to be a special word (Song Zhenhao) for the middle of the day; the other thought that the word would draw " day " with a hand to show the day. The boundary of night (Gu Yankui). The statement is for reference.

Oracle " Day " means daytime, "Collection" 22942: "Today." Inscriptions also mean daytime, 㝬𣪕: "Yu Wang (无) 㝩 day and night" means that I have no leisure day and night.

The " day " of the bamboo slips during the Warring States period also refers to the daytime, "Shanghai Bo Zhushu IV. Cao Mo Zhichen, Jane 10-11: "Not going to bed in the daytime" refers to not going to bed in the daytime.

" Day " in the handed down literature mostly refers to daytime, "Guang Ya. Interpretation IV": "Day, Ming also." "Poetry. Bin Feng. "July": "The day is in the mao, and the night is the sorrow." Zheng Xuanjian: "The girl (ru) fetches the mao in the day and the day, and the noose is used in the night." The full sentence means you take the thatch during the day , Lay the noose at night. In addition, " Day " was also used as a place name, which was the city of Qi in the Spring and Autumn Period, in the northwest of Zibo City, Shandong Province. "Mencius. "Gongsun Chouxia": "Three nights and then out of the day." Later, he took the place name, "Tongzhi. Clan Slightly Three": "Zhou Shi, "Fun Su Tong": "Dr. Qi eats Zhou Yi, Yin Shi Yan."
humanum_short_description_en: Jia Jin inscription from "聿" from "日", used to express the meaning of day.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「聿」從「日」，用來表示白晝的意思，唯構形初義不詳。《說文》：「晝，日之出入，與夜為界。从畫省，从日。𦘘，籒文晝。」一說認為「聿」為「晝」的聲符，以「日」為形符點明白晝之義(何琳儀、黃錫全)。「聿」與「晝」雖然聲母相近，但由於二字韻部相去甚遠，此說似難成立。一說以為「晝」象立木為表測度日影以定時辰，後引申為日中時分的專字(宋鎮豪)；一則以為字會用手執筆畫「日」之意，以示畫出日夜間的界限(谷衍奎)。其說可供參考。

　　甲骨文「晝」表示白天，《合集》22942：「今晝。」金文亦表示白天，㝬𣪕：「余亡(無)㝩晝夜」，指我日夜都沒有閑逸。

　　戰國竹簡「晝」亦指白天，《上博竹書四．曹沫之陳》簡10-11：「不晝寢」，指不在白天睡覺。

　　傳世文獻中「晝」多指白天，《廣雅．釋詁四》：「晝，明也。」《詩．豳風．七月》：「晝爾于茅，宵爾索綯。」鄭玄箋：「女(汝)當晝日往取茅歸，夜作絞索以待時用」，全句指你在白天拿取茅草，夜裏把絞繩打好。另，「晝」又用作地名，為春秋時齊國城邑，在今山東省淄博市西北。《孟子．公孫丑下》：「三宿而後出晝。」後又以地名為姓，《通志．氏族略三》：「晝氏，《風俗通》：『齊大夫食采晝邑，因氏焉。』」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「聿」從「日」，用來表示白晝的意思。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
晝 (Simplified: 昼)
Pinyin: zhòu
English Definition: daytime
Antonyms: 夜
Total strokes: 11; Radical: 日
Pictophonetic: 聿 indicates the sound; 旦 (day) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 聿 [ yù ] writing brush, pencil; thereupon
    • 旦 [ dàn ] dawn; morning; day
Example Words:
晝夜 [ zhòu yè ]: day and night; period of 24 hours; continuously, without stop
晝伏夜出 [ zhòu fú yè chū ]: nocturnal; to hide by day and come out at night
晝夜不息 [ zhòu yè bù xī ]: day and night without rest (idiom)
晝長夜短 [ zhòu cháng yè duǎn ]: (In summer) the days are long and the nights short. (idiom)
More: 晝* | *晝 | *晝*

晝字的基本解释

晝
zhòu
见“昼”。

晝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhòu］
［《廣韻》陟救切，去宥，知。］
“昼1”的繁体字。
(1)白天；从日出至日落的时间。
(2)指中午。
(3)春秋齐邑名。在今山东省淄博市境。
(4)姓。

晝字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　晝； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页495第43
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?陟救切，音呪。【說文】日之出入，與夜爲界。从畫省，从日。【易·晉卦】晝日三接。　又地名。【孟子】三宿，而後出晝。　又姓。【風俗通】晝邑大夫之後，因氏焉。　又【韻補】叶株遇切。【張衡·西京賦】衞尉八屯，警夜巡晝。植鎩懸瞂，用戒不虞。虞去聲。

晝字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
晝字的起名意思

暂无。

day
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhòu］
["Guang Yun" Zhi rescue cut, go to you, know. ]
Traditional characters for "Day 1".
(1) Daytime; the time from sunrise to sunset.
(2) Refers to noon.
(3) The name of Qiyi in the Spring and Autumn Period. In today's Zibo City, Shandong Province.
(4) Last name.
day

[Easy·Jin Gua] Three days a day.　Also place name. [Mencius] Three nights, and then out of the day.　Another last name. [Customs and Customs] After the day of the doctor, Yin's Yan.　[Rhyme Supplement] The leaves and plants are cut. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Weiwei Batun, the police patrol the night and day.
